recipestep.name: Intro to How to Use a Chef's Knife
recipestep.description: <p>This instructional cooking video on Intro to How to Use a Chef’s Knife, is part of the Rouxbe Cooking School.</p><p>This cooking video is taken from the lesson on <br /><strong><a>How to Cut Using a Chef’s Knife.</a></strong></p>
